heading: Reviews
subheading: Check out what others are saying about Brittany Leigh Jewelry!

reviews.review_text: Brittany is AMAZING!!! She responded to my order immediately, gave me more options for my pendant then I would have expected, and when it arrived it was simply perfect. Exactly like my mother's script. Thank you!! It's a beautiful piece of jewelry that I will cherish forever
Brittany is so wonderful to work with! The jewelry was beautiful and the recipient absolutely loved it! Can't recommend more highly!

I love the Necklace. It was wonderful and so easy to work with Brittany. The necklace came promptly, as promised. I cannot wait to give it to my granddaughter for her graduation. I definitely will order again. It is a treasure!
